original_text: So David hid in the field. At the time of the new moon, the king sat down to eat the special meal.
korean_text: 다윗이 들에 숨으니라 초하루가 되매 왕이 앉아 음식을 먹을 때에

sentences.original_text: So David hid in the field.
At the time of the new moon,
the king sat down to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 王は食事をするために座り、
特別な食事をしました。
